 2000-00062000-01-120,  IA&ND,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into a SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT between the Federal Crown, the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA and the NAZKO INDIAN BAND for the purpose of resolving a specific claim involving some 120 hectares of land cut-off from their reserve land base in 1916.
